items.title: Jigar Patel advises profit booking after recent Nifty surge, picks three stock ideas for short term
items.description: While the Nifty 50 is currently trading at new highs, there are signs of caution. The daily RSI is showing negative divergence, and the index is facing resistance near a rising trendline.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Britannia, Bajaj Finserv, Piramal Enterprises, Ceat and others on Monday?
items.description: The Nifty 50 may consolidate before showing the next leg of the upmove towards a new high. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.
